name: Battery (POPKiing, MySoul00)
description:
Battery is a cute arcade style game with wave where you must drain enemies power to regain your battery !

(Play in full screen for better experience)

If pressing X On controller or L on keyboard misses enemy, or touch a slime, lose 1 Health.

Hold X On controller or L on keyboard in front of a non-slime enemy to drain 1 Health

Jump on enemies Head with A on controller or space on keybord to kill them without spending Health.
